name: BigQuery Export
description: Sends events to a BigQuery database on ingestion.

config.name: JSON file with your google cloud key

config.hint: A table will be created if it does not exist.
config.name: Table ID
Events to ignore
config.hint: Comma separated list of events to ignore

config.name: Maximum upload size in bytes
config.hint: Default 1MB. Upload events after buffering this many of them. The value must be between 1 MB and 10 MB.

config.name: Export events at least every X seconds
config.hint: Default 30 seconds. If there are events to upload and this many seconds has passed since the last upload, then upload the queued events. The value must be between 1 and 600 seconds.

config.name: Attempt deduplicating events?
config.hint: Default 'Yes'. We try to deduplicate events being sent to Bigquery if set to 'Yes'. Set to 'No' to increase Bigquery insertion quota limit
